title: Enhancing Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Linking Mobile Learning with Learners' Cognitive Styles and Educational Preferences

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and experience with mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their own cognitive styles (holistic-analytic, verbal-imagery).
Learners can select and apply science learning methods (e.g., collaborative activities, media types) according to their cognitive styles.
Learners can propose science problem-solving strategies that reflect cognitive style optimization through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
